title: PayPal
shortDescription: Sell items on your site with PayPal buttons.
longDescription:
PayPal is the leading way to add e-commerce to your site without complicated setup or configuration. Whether you're setting up a store or accepting donations, you will be ready to accept money from your visitors in seconds.

## Features

- Allows for purchasing items, adding items to cart, setting up subscriptions, and accepting donations.

- Includes support for USD, GBP, JPY, CAD and EUR currencies.

- Add multiple buttons for multiple products.
author: PayPal Inc.

categories.title: Widgets & Plugins
categories.description: Apps that add functionality and services to your website.

categories.title: Make Money On Your Site
categories.description: Apps to help you make money from your website.

categories.title: Recommended For Stores
categories.description: Apps for stores in the recommendation engine.

categories.title: Marketing
categories.description: Promote content, collect email addresses, and increase engagement.

categories.title: E-Commerce
categories.description: Tools to help your online business.
